Description: Beautiful sunny and bright studio in Brighton! Located in a quiet residential neighborhood but still has easy access to the city via public transportation, steps from the Chiswick Road - Commonwealth Ave @ Chiswick Rd bus stop and Sutherland Road T-stop Plenty of Natural Light, Spacious, newly updated kitchen, WASHER/DRYER IN UNIT GRAD STUDENTS OK, PETS OK, street PARKING available Heat and Hot Water included in rent, street parking
